trigger_event: On every push to a feature branch
success_criteria: Build compiles; SonarQube analysis passes (no new code smells/bugs); Unit test suite passes (>95% success); Unit test coverage for new code > 85%.
failure_action: Block pull request merge; Notify developer.
escalation_procedure: PR cannot be merged until fixed.
business_impact: Prevents basic defects and code quality issues from entering the main branch.

success_criteria: All integration tests pass (>98% success); OWASP Dependency-Check finds zero critical/high vulnerabilities; Application packages successfully (MSIX).
failure_action: Break the build; Notify entire team via chat channel.
business_impact: Ensures the main branch is always in a stable, deployable state.

success_criteria: Automated E2E regression suite passes (100%); All manual UAT test cases signed off by Product Owner; Performance benchmarks are met; No outstanding P0 or P1 bugs.
failure_action: Block production deployment; Trigger a release post-mortem.
business_impact: Final quality check to prevent defects from impacting users in production.
